testcase.name: Get 10 articles from the page
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed Given params { limit: 10, offset: 0 } ..................................... passed Given path 'articles' ..................................................... passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.articles == '#[10]' .................................... passed And match response.articlesCount == 500 ................................... passed And match response.articlesCount != 100 ................................... passed And match response == {"articles": "#array", "articlesCount": 500 } ....... passed And match response.articles[0].createdAt contains '2021' .................. passed And match response.articles[*].author.bio contains null ................... passed And match each response..following == false ............................... passed
